name: RM - Styling - Swirling & Dynamic
prompt: dynamic swirling composition of {prompt} . fluid motion lines, spiraling energy, rhythmic flow, turbulent atmosphere, sweeping curves, kinetic aesthetic, vortex-like movement
negative_prompt: static, still, rigid, straight lines, blocky, calm, frozen

name: RM - Styling - Vibrant Color Explosion
prompt: intense vibrant color styling of {prompt} . highly saturated hues, intense palette, chromatic richness, vivid colors, explosive color contrast, glowing brilliance, pure spectrum colors
negative_prompt: desaturated, dull, monochrome, grayscale, pastel, muted, dark, faded, washed out, low contrast

name: RM - Styling - Twisted & Contorted
prompt: twisted and contorted form of {prompt} . spiral distortion, unnatural stretching, warping geometry, disorienting perspective, malleable texture, surreal deformation, writhing complexity
negative_prompt: straight, normal, anatomical, rigid, balanced, symmetrical, clean

name: RM - Styling - Liquid Flow
prompt: fluid liquid styling of {prompt} . melting viscous textures, dripping flow, smooth organic curves, aqueous motion, seamless shape transitions, soft surrealism, molten aesthetic
negative_prompt: dry, solid, rough, jagged, hard edges, dusty, frozen

name: RM - Styling - Fractal
prompt: fractal geometry styling of {prompt} . infinite recursive patterns, mathematical complexity, self-similar details, mandala-like structure, kaleidoscopic arrangement, mesmerizing depth
negative_prompt: simple, minimal, random, chaotic, organic, asymmetrical

name: RM - Styling - Geometric Abstraction
prompt: sharp geometric styling of {prompt} . angular polygons, abstract shapes, mathematical precision, hard edges, structured composition, low-poly influence, constructivist aesthetic
negative_prompt: organic, curved, soft, natural, messy, chaotic, flowing

name: RM - Styling - Glitch & Noise
prompt: digital glitch styling of {prompt} . datamoshing effects, pixel sorting, signal corruption, chromatic aberration, technological distortion, fragmented reality, visual noise
negative_prompt: clean, clear, smooth, analog, natural, perfect, hd

name: RM - Styling - Crystalline Shatter
prompt: shattered crystalline styling of {prompt} . faceted shard geometry, prismatic refraction, sharp angular fragments, glass-like transparency, jagged edges, fragile complexity, explosive dispersion
negative_prompt: soft, round, dull, opaque, smooth, melting, fluid

name: RM - Styling - Nebulous & Ethereal
prompt: nebulous ethereal styling of {prompt} . forming from mist and smoke, indistinct edges, gaseous textures, floating particulate matter, atmospheric dispersion, soft focus dreamlike quality
negative_prompt: solid, hard, defined, sharp, heavy, geometric, clear

name: RM - Styling - Explosive Dispersion
prompt: explosive dynamic styling of {prompt} . debris scattering, high velocity particles, bursting energy, chaotic dispersion, impact shockwaves, intense outward motion, disintegration
negative_prompt: calm, whole, solid, static, imploding, gathered, clean

name: RM - Styling - Bioluminescent Veins
prompt: intricate glowing vascular styling of {prompt} . branching luminous veins, subsurface scattering, pulsating energy lines, organic network, electric nervous system aesthetic
negative_prompt: flat, matte, dark, dead, solid, simple, external light

name: RM - Styling - Fluid
prompt: abstract fluid styling of {prompt} . seamless flowing forms, undulating curves, aerodynamic elegance, smooth continuous motion, liquid organic aesthetic, graceful distortion, soft transitions
negative_prompt: sharp, rigid, blocky, geometric, jagged, static, friction

name: RM - Styling - Hyper-Intricate Detail
prompt: hyper-intricate styling of {prompt} . an overabundance of hyper fine details, microscopic precision, immensely complex ornate patterns, dense interlocking structures, super precise textures, infinite resolution, maximalist complexity, meticulously crafted design scattered with minute elements throughout the composition.
negative_prompt: simple, minimal, blurry, low resolution, smooth, plain, empty, vague, soft, flat, undetailed, cartoon, sketch

name: RM - Styling - Iridescent Oil Slick
prompt: iridescent oil slick styling of {prompt} . rainbow chemical sheen, thin film interference, psychedelic reflection, glossy surface, shifting colors, toxic beauty, slippery texture
negative_prompt: matte, dull, monochrome, dry, rough, stone, wood

name: RM - Styling - Ink Wash Diffusion
prompt: ink wash diffusion styling of {prompt} . spreading pigment in water, smokey gradients, high contrast sumi-e aesthetic, bleeding edges, organic dispersion, monochrome elegance, fluid staining
negative_prompt: sharp, hard edges, geometric, colorful, solid, plastic, 3d

name: RM - Styling - Heavy Impasto
prompt: heavy impasto oil styling of {prompt} . thick raised paint strokes, palette knife texture, tactile depth, expressive brushwork, oil paint smell, rich color layering, artistic abstraction
negative_prompt: flat, digital, smooth, vector, thin, watercolor, photorealistic

name: RM - Styling - Kintsugi Restoration
prompt: kintsugi restoration styling of {prompt} . cracked porcelain texture, gold-filled seams, beauty in brokenness, ceramic shards, precious scars, intricate spiderweb cracks, wabi-sabi aesthetic
negative_prompt: perfect, whole, new, plastic, rubber, soft, flexible
